scripts.jekyll: npm run browserify && bundle exec jekyll build
scripts.build: gulp clean && npm run jekyll && npm run minify:images && npm run minify:js && npm run minify:css && npm run minify:html && gulp inject && gulp copy-admin
scripts.browserify: browserify -t [ browserify-css --stripComments=true src/vendors/vendors.css --output src/jekyll/vendors.bundle.css] src/vendors/vendors.js -o src/jekyll/vendors.bundle.js
